( #{item.giftCardOrderNo}, #{item.giftCardNo}, #{item.pinNumber}, #{item.accableStatus}, #{item.payableStatus}, #{item.giftCardStatus}, #{item.giftCardType}, #{item.giftCardAmount}, #{item.giftCardSalePrice}, #{item.deliveryStatus}, #{item.accQrData}, #{item.payQrData}, #{item.accQrScanner}, #{item.payQrScanner}, #{item.accQrScanTime}, #{item.payQrScanTime}, #{item.issueTime}, #{item.expirationTime}, NOW(), NOW() )
